title: Nasus
body:
Hi, 
If I am playing against a Nasus and his just farming most of the game. Do I
A. Baby sit him the whole time while his farming
B. Leave my lane and let him farm and group mid and push out or force a team-fight
C. Leave my lane and help my team mates to win their lanes
Thanks

replies.body: Well, as a half time nasus player, i find that when i play nasus and my top laner starts fights away from my lane i.e. roaming mid, forcing fights at drake or TPing bot, it puts me at a big disadvantage, because I will either have to use my TP to follow him, or stay and lane and keep stacking ricking him pulling of a successful roam and getting other lanes fed, but if you do decide to follow him you are losing farm, which is bad as a nasus, but usually with nasus i find that wou just shove the lane as hard as possible, because nasus eats towers for dinner, and just taking towers, and then doing a bit of counter jungling after you get a tower
Thanks for all the tips everyone :D
do d: group as a team to shut him down again and again.
Play aggressive ish early game and he'll be going 0 and 5 before you know it.
don't let him farm just poke him down until you can slay him
D. Smeck him so hard his Nan will get sore just thinking about it.
